name: Repo
body:
###APK repo.
Usage

```bash

echo "https://alpine-library.github.io/repo/$ALPINE_VERSION" >> /etc/apt/repositories

cat <<EOF > /etc/apk/keys/alpine-library.github.io-5629488a.rsa.pub
-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
MIIBIjANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAAOCAQ8AMIIBCgKCAQEA3Jakqw7KWemvaMNcR5Jh
RKCajAiyr5W8QTd6vEkLa6EGKlfhfpIvoITl/o8ds+XTJHEXG9Y+TcrvDMrKEk/q
DxrYJ+JX2Y/uCX31hZjpdDhO4YMK7hLPbXHIAl4C3vPaXPpEpf00Q4TcIkde6GNr
HOyrNnGKunAVRSFGdj/XRR3q9pe0zEKIA2PlTJ3Ly4YflN0wMF7Zm4D3Ori/D1bn
HixLR1GObSwP3wXjXl8ZvK+OvFXKlfLfQepiyWIH4QvLmLDnDRnBIHF0614S4z++
meEfcDwl+fLx/BT0PtcGLUBR8d3UX/uxJV5s84AKsCvQQ47Sdyymsc5Xvkdi/axs
mwIDAQAB
-----END PUBLIC KEY-----
EOF


```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
